....made 2 arrests (1 felony, 1 misdemeanor DUI), and stored 3 vehicles. Street Racing and Side Show activity is extremely unsafe and something we take very seriously. We don’t want this activity to occur in our neighborhoods and we know you don’t either.

We teamed up with @SantaRosaPolice this weekend & deployed a special Street Racing/ Side Show enforcement team focusing on illegally modified vehicles. In just 5 hrs, the CHP issued 25 citations (2 for open container of cannabis), gave 4 verbal warnings.....

Don’t hesitate to designate a sober driver this Memorial Day weekend. CHP’s Maximum Enforcement Period is underway and extra officers are working to remove DUI drivers from our roadways.
